capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Responsible for processing license applications and renewals efficiently and accurately.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Must manage competing priorities in a high-volume, fast-paced environment.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Ensures accuracy and compliance with policies, procedures, and legislation.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Frequent engagement with a diverse range of stakeholders and clear, professional correspondence.

capabilities.name: Commit to Customer Service
capabilities.description: Delivering high-quality customer service and adapting to changing systems and priorities.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Working as part of the Conservation Programs team and with various stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: Working independently with minimal supervision and a commitment to learning.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: Engagement with diverse communities and commitment to inclusive workplace.

skills.name: Administrative and Organisational Skills
skills.description: Well-developed skills for managing licensing processes and supporting conservation objectives.

skills.name: Attention to Detail
skills.description: Critical for reviewing and processing licensing information accurately.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Engaging with internal and external stakeholders regarding wildlife licensing.

skills.name: Adaptability
skills.description: Flexibility to adapt to changing systems, processes, and priorities.

generalRole.title: Environmental Licensing Support Officer
generalRole.description: This role involves administrative support within an environmental context, focusing on the processing and management of wildlife licensing to support conservation efforts. It requires a blend of administrative skills, customer service, and an understanding of environmental policies.
